# docker-nuke

Quickly `kill`, then `rm` a docker container by it's name or SHA.

```bash
% docker-nuke ollama
Targets Locked:
         - 635c0c064feaa404d1d4b9638bb5cc1d1cff98ca9e4bf3d9b533d093a233d3d1 ollama
Fire? (y/N)
```

## Install

```bash
pipx install hdocker-nuke
```
